# ggplot themes

The ggplot themes provided by this package work as usual ggplot themes:

```{r}
mpg %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = cty, y = displ)) +
    geom_point() +
    theme_mediocre() +
    labs(title = "A very nice title", subtitle = "A desapointing subtitle")

mpg %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = cty, y = displ, fill = manufacturer)) +
    geom_col() +
    theme_mediocre() +
    labs(title = "A very nice title", subtitle = "A desapointing subtitle")
```
